Upgrade.Title: Telepathy
Upgrade.Ability: You may discard this card immediately before you move in order to change your Maneuver for that round.

Upgrade.Title: Biological Technology
Upgrade.Ability: Place 1 Mission Token on this card at the start of each Planning Phase. When attacking, you may spend up to 2 of these tokens to add an equal number of attack dice. When defending, you may spend up to 2 of these tokens to add an equal number of defense dice. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 "Biological Technology" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Biogenic Field
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, you roll +1 defense die (+3 vs a Borg ship). In addition, when an enemy card ability affects one of your cards, roll 1 attack die (3 dice against a Borg card ability). If your roll a [BATTLESTATIONS] result, the card effect is cancelled. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 "Biogenic Field" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Electrodynamic Fluid
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to immediately perform a 2nd maneuver from your Maneuver Dial with a speed of 3 or less. OR ACTION: Disable this card to perform a [SENSOR ECHO] Action even if your ship is not cloaked. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 ship.

Upgrade.Title: Fluidic Space
Upgrade.Ability: Instead of making a normal move, you may discard this card to remove your ship from the play area and immediately place it back anywhere in the play area, but not within Range 1-2 of any other ship. You cannot attack or perform any Actions on the round you use this ability. This Upgrade costs +5 SP if purchased for a non-Species 8472 ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 "Fluidic Space" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Grand Nagus
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Discard this card to target every friendly Ferengi ship within Range 1-3. Each target ship may immediately perform an additional green maneuver.

Upgrade.Title: Odo
Upgrade.Ability: During the Planning Phase, you may target a ship within Range 1-3 and choose 1 [CREW] Upgrade on the target ship. If you do so, treat this card as an exact copy of the chosen Upgrade until the end of the End Phase in which you use this ability. If the chosen Upgrade's Action or ability requires it to be disabled or discarded, you must disable or discard this card to use it.

Upgrade.Title: Nog
Upgrade.Ability: When defending, during the Roll Attack Dice step, you may discard this card to force the attacking ship to roll -2 attack dice for that attack.

Upgrade.Title: Rom
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Repair 1 Shield Token. If this card is assigned to a Ferengi ship, you may repair up to 2 Shield Tokens instead of 1.

Upgrade.Title: Cargo Hold
Upgrade.Ability: Add 2 Upgrade slots ([CREW] or [TECH]) to your Upgrade Bar. These Upgrades cannot have a cost greater than 4 SP. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Ferengi ship and no ship may be equipped with more than 1 "Cargo Hold" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Inversion Wave
Upgrade.Ability: Instead of making a normal move, you may discard this card to place your ship anywhere in the play area within Range 1-3 of your current position. Remove all Tokens (except Critical Hit Tokens) from beside your ship and place an Auxiliary Power Token beside your ship. You cannot attack on the round you use this ability. No ship may be equipped with more than 1 "Inversion Wave" Upgrade.

Upgrade.Title: Smugglers
Upgrade.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-3. Discard this card to steal 1 [TECH] or [WEAPON] Upgrade from the target ship, even if it exceeds your ship's restrictions. If the Smugglers Upgrade is assigned to a Ferengi Shuttle, the stolen Upgrade is flipped face down and cannot be used by your ship. The shuttle may exchange the stolen Upgrade with a docking ship. The docking ship may then flip the stolen Upgrade face up and use it. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Ferengi Captain assigned to a Ferengi ship.

Upgrade.Title: Biological Weapon
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: Discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, in addition to normal damage, discard 1 [CREW] Upgrade of your choice on the defending ship for each [BATTLESTATIONS] result (max 2). This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 Bioship.

Upgrade.Title: Energy Blast
Upgrade.Ability: ATTACK: [TARGET LOCK] Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. This Upgrade may only be purchased for a Species 8472 Bioship.
